languages.text: "Наглядное доказательство того, что над людьми должен стоять лишь закон Императора. Не закон человека, каким бы праведным он себя ни мнил".
languages.translation_comment: After arriving on Footfall in Chapter 4 and seeing Chorda's trial (but before the RT decides what to do with the station).

traits.locale_text: "Наглядное доказательство того, что над людьми должен стоять лишь закон Императора. Не закон человека, каким бы праведным он себя не мнил".

languages.text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."
languages.translation_comment: After arriving on Footfall in Chapter 4 and seeing Chorda's trial (but before the RT decides what to do with the station).
languages.original_text: "Наглядное доказательство того, что над людьми должен стоять лишь закон Императора. Не закон человека, каким бы праведным он себя ни мнил".

traits.locale_text: "A clear proof that only the Emperor's law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."
"A clear proof that only the Emperor's law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."
"Clear proof that only the Emperor's law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."
"Clear proof that only the Emperor's law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."
"Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."
"Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."

languages.text: 「これこそが明白な証だ。我らの上に立つべきは、ただ皇帝の法のみ。いかに自らを正しいと称えようとも、人の法では不可能だ」
languages.original_text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."

traits.locale_text: 「これこそが明白な証だ。我らの上に立つべきは、ただ皇帝の法のみ。いかに自らを正しいと称えようとも、人の法では不可能だ」

languages.text: "Der eindeutige Beweis, dass nur das Gesetz des Imperators über uns stehen darf. Nicht das Gesetz der Menschen, so rechtschaffen sie sich auch geben."
languages.original_text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."

traits.locale_text: "Der eindeutige Beweis, dass nur das Gesetz des Imperators über uns stehen darf. Nicht das Gesetz der Menschen, so rechtschaffen sie sich auch geben."

languages.text: « Voilà bien la preuve que seule la loi de l'Empereur doit nous gouverner. Pas la loi du peuple, même s'il la croit tout aussi juste. »
languages.original_text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà bien la preuve que seule la loi de l'Empereur doit nous gouverner. Pas la loi du peuple, même s'il la croit tout aussi juste. »
« Voilà bien la preuve que seule la loi de l'Empereur doit nous gouverner. Pas la loi du peuple, même s'il la croit tout aussi juste. »

languages.text: «Prueba fehaciente de que solo la ley del Emperador está por encima de todos. No las leyes del pueblo, por muy justas y virtuosas que digan ser».
languages.original_text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."

traits.locale_text: «Prueba fehaciente de que solo la ley del Emperador está por encima de todos. No las leyes del pueblo, por muy justas y virtuosas que digan ser».

languages.text: “这清楚地证明了这一点：帝皇的律法必须高于一切。无论某些人如何自诩正义，也无权以法律的名义胡作非为。”
languages.original_text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."

traits.locale_text: “这清楚地证明了这一点：帝皇的律法必须高于一切。无论某些人如何自诩正义，也无权以法律的名义胡作非为。”

languages.text: "Her ne kadar haklı olduklarını iddia etseler de insanların değil İmparator'un Yasası'nın üstünlüğü kanıtlanmış oldu."
languages.original_text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."

traits.locale_text: "Her ne kadar haklı olduklarını iddia etseler de insanların değil İmparator'un Yasası'nın üstünlüğü kanıtlanmış oldu."
"Her ne kadar haklı olduklarını iddia etseler de insanların değil İmparator'un kanunlarının üstünlüğü kanıtlanmış oldu."

languages.original_text: "Clear proof that only the Emperor's Law must stand above us all. Not the law of people, no matter how righteous they claim to be."
